Song.title: Your Great Name We Praise
Song.copyright: Words by Walter Smith Alt. words & arr. by Bob Kauflin Â© 2002 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G | G | G | G | G C | Em C | G C | Em C | 3/8 C |]
Verse 1: Im[C]mortal, in[D]visible [C]God only [G]wise In [C]light inac[D]cessible [C]hid from our [G]eyes Most [Em]holy, most glorious, [Em/D]the [Cmaj7]ancient of days [9/8 | Am]Almighty, vic[Em9]torious,{,} Your [D]great name [6/8 |]we [G C | Em C | G C | Em D |]praise
Verse 2: Un[C]resting, un[D]hasting and [C]silent as [G]light Not [C]wanting or [D]wasting, You [C]rule us in [G]might Your [Em]justice like mountains,{,} [Em/D]high [Cmaj7]soaring above Y[9/8 |]our [Am]clouds which are [Em9]fountains{,} of [D]goodness a[6/8 |]nd [G |]love
Chorus: Most [C/G]Ho[G]ly, Most [C/G]glori[G]ous [9/8 |]The [D]An[Em]cient of [C]Days [6/8 | C/G]Almigh[G]ty, vic[C/G]tori[G]ous Your [D]great [Em]name we [C]praise [| G C | Em D | G C | Em D |]
{new_page} Verse 3: All [C]life comes from [D]You Lord, to [C]both great and [G]small In [C]all life you [D]live Lord, the [C]true life of [G]all We [Em]blossom and flourish,{,} [Em/D]but [C]quickly grow frail [9/8 |]We [Am]wither and [Em9]perish,{,} but [D]You ne[6/8 |]ver [G (to chorus)]fail.
Bridge: [Em C | G D | Em C | G D |]
[A D | F#m E | A D | F#m E D C#m | C2]
{key:A} Verse 4: Great [DM7/F#]Father of [AM7/G#]glory, pure [DM7/F#]Father of [AM7/E]light Your [DM7/F#]angels a[AM7/G#]dore you all [DM7/F#]veiling their [AM7/E]sight All [F#m7]praise we will render, O Father of grace[E] [9/8 |]Till [Bm]one day in [F#m9]splendor we [E]see face [6/8 |]to [A2 G2 |]face.
Chorus: Most [D/A]Ho[AM7]ly, Most [D/A]glori[AM7]ous [9/8 |]The [E]An[F#m]cient of [D]Days [6/8 | D/A]Almigh[AM7]ty, vic[D/A]tori[AM7]ous Your [E]great [F#m]name we [D]praise
Tag: [||: A D | F#m E (3x):|| A D | F#m E E D2 | D2 |]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 immortal invisible god only wise in light inaccessible hid from our eyes most holy most glorious the ancient of days almighty victorious your great name we praise verse 2 unresting unhasting and silent as light not wanting or wasting you rule us in might your justice like mountains high soaring above your clouds which are fountains of goodness and love chorus most holy most glorious the ancient of days almighty victorious your great name we praise verse 3 all life comes from you lord to both great and small in all life you live lord the true life of all we blossom and flourish but quickly grow frail we wither and perish but you never fail bridge verse 4 great father of glory pure father of light your angels adore you all veiling their sight all praise we will render o father of grace till one day in splendor we see face to face chorus most holy most glorious the ancient of days almighty victorious your great name we praise tag
Arrangement.album: Upward: The Bob Kauflin Hymns Project

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G | G | G | G | G C | Em C | G C | Em C | 3/8 C |]
Verse 1: Im[C]mortal, in[D]visible [C]God only [G]wise In [C]light inac[D]cessible [C]hid from our [G]eyes Most [Em]holy, most glorious, [Em/D]the [Cmaj7]ancient of days [9/8 | Am]Almighty, vic[Em9]torious,{,} Your [D]great name [6/8 |]we [G C | Em C | G C | Em D |]praise
Verse 2: Un[C]resting, un[D]hasting and [C]silent as [G]light Not [C]wanting or [D]wasting, You [C]rule us in [G]might Your [Em]justice like mountains,{,} [Em/D]high [Cmaj7]soaring above Y[9/8 |]our [Am]clouds which are [Em9]fountains{,} of [D]goodness a[6/8 |]nd [G |]love
Chorus: Most [C/G]Ho[G]ly, Most [C/G]glori[G]ous [9/8 |]The [D]An[Em]cient of [C]Days [6/8 | C/G]Almigh[G]ty, vic[C/G]tori[G]ous Your [D]great [Em]name we [C]praise [| G C | Em D | G C | Em D |]
Verse 3: All [C]life comes from [D]You Lord, to [C]both great and [G]small In [C]all life you [D]live Lord, the [C]true life of [G]all We [Em]blossom and flourish,{,} [Em/D]but [C]quickly grow frail [9/8 |]We [Am]wither and [Em9]perish,{,} but [D]You ne[6/8 |]ver [G (to chorus)]fail.
Verse 4: Great [C]Father of [D]glory, pure [C]Father of [G]light Your [C]angels a[D]dore you all [C]veiling their [G]sight All [Em]praise we will render, [Em/D]O [C]Father of grace [9/8 |]Till [Am]one day in [Em9]splendor we [D]see face [6/8 |]to [G (to chorus)]face.
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 immortal invisible god only wise in light inaccessible hid from our eyes most holy most glorious the ancient of days almighty victorious your great name we praise verse 2 unresting unhasting and silent as light not wanting or wasting you rule us in might your justice like mountains high soaring above your clouds which are fountains of goodness and love chorus most holy most glorious the ancient of days almighty victorious your great name we praise verse 3 all life comes from you lord to both great and small in all life you live lord the true life of all we blossom and flourish but quickly grow frail we wither and perish but you never fail verse 4 great father of glory pure father of light your angels adore you all veiling their sight all praise we will render o father of grace till one day in splendor we see face to face
Arrangement.album: Upward: The Bob Kauflin Hymns Project
